Package de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.misc

Class ConfigurationTransformer

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.misc.ConfigurationTransformer
public class ConfigurationTransformer extends Object
Class that reads individually configurable terminology codes from YAML and converts them into required formats and data types for data queries and data processing.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    ConfigurationTransformer.ConfigurationContext
    Some parts of the local configuration require individual handling in the reading and evaluation process.

    • extractKidsRadarDiagnosisConditions

      public static Map<String,List<String>> extractKidsRadarDiagnosisConditions(CustomGlobalConfiguration customGlobalConfiguration, KidsRadarDataItemContext kidsRadarDataItemContext)
      Extracts either the KidsRadarDataItemContext.KJP or the KidsRadarDataItemContext.RSV conditions dynamically from the provided global configuration.
      Parameters:
      customGlobalConfiguration - the global configuration containing input codes
      kidsRadarDataItemContext - the context for which the diagnosis conditions should be extracted (KJP or RSV)
      Returns:
      A map where all the icd codes are assigned to a diagnosis group key.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if globalConfiguration or kidsRadarDataItemContext is null.
